name: mircl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

stmt.origin: mirf(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
stmt.pretty: mirf(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(cmir, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c7, c8))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ c6 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ c7 =(pInvG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c2)
⊣ c0 =(c7 ` c8)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(clng, c3))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(cmir, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c8, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c7, c8))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
⊣ c6 =(LineG ` c3)
⊣ c7 =(pInvG ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ c2)
⊣ c0 =(c7 ` c8)

comment: Closure of the point inversion function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2019.)
